CreateCommitteMembersTable: Create table  IF NOT EXISTS CommitteMembers(AdminID Varchar(225),FullName Varchar(225),Email Varchar(225),PhnNumber Varchar(10),CommitteName Varchar(20),Address Varchar(20),Password Varchar(225))
AddCommitteMember: INSERT INTO CommitteMembers (AdminID, FullName, Email, PhnNumber, CommitteName,Address,Password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?)
Committecheck: SELECT * FROM Admins WHERE AdminID = ? AND CommitteName = ?
Committelogin: SELECT * FROM Admins Where Email=? AND Password=?
